allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h 127.0.0.1 -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -c "UPDATE maintenance_teams SET area_id = ''AREA_EAST_001'' WHERE worker_id IN (''U_MAINTAINER_001'', ''U_MAINTAINER_002''); UPDATE maintenance_teams SET area_id = ''AREA_WEST_001'' WHERE worker_id IN (''U_MAINTAINER_003'', ''U_MAINTAINER_004''); UPDATE maintenance_teams SET area_id = ''AREA_EAST_001'' WHERE worker_id = ''U_INSPECTOR_001''; UPDATE maintenance_teams SET area_id = ''AREA_WEST_001'' WHERE worker_id = ''U_INSPECTOR_002'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h 127.0.0.1 -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres -c "SELECT id, title, status, assignee_id, area_id FROM workorders WHERE assignee_id = ''U_MAINTAINER_001'' OR area_id = ''AREA_EAST_001'' LIMIT 5;")
